pr_title: Support pushdown for date, tinyint and smallint types in Cassandra

timeline.message: Support pushdown for date, tinyint and smallint types in Cassandra
Support pushdown for date, tinyint and smallint types in Cassandra

timeline.bodyText: Seems like these two types already had the necessary code implemented?
timeline.author: hashhar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -443,8 +448,11 @@ public boolean isSupportedPartitionKey()
             case DOUBLE:
             case INET:
             case INT:
+            case TINYINT:
+            case SMALLINT:

replies.bodyText: Yes, I simply forgot updating this switch statements when adding those types.
replies.author: ebyhr
